alert.note: Alert for Hawkins; Sullivan; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sullivan, northeastern Hawkins and northwestern Washington Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rogersville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Rogersville, Surgoinsville, Church Hill, Mount Carmel, Sullivan Gardens, Fall Branch and Bays Mountain Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
